LanguageData.LegacyFairy.UI.desc_BrillianceCharge: It uses the power of brilliance to greatly reduce the time it takes to fire a shot.\n\n1WP is consumed per second.
LanguageData.LegacyFairy.UI.desc_PrayertoDestiny:
Drop any item or creature (except for some) in a drop pot near the colony.
Then, you spend WP according to the silver value of the dropped item.

The creature does not belong to anywhere and falls in a state of anesthesia.

When an item is selected, it will try to summon up to the stack limit if it has extra WP.

CoolDown:10Day
LanguageData.LegacyFairy.Item.WishEnd: A {0} has fallen on your colony.
